summary.span: 表示可以存放多個資料物件的容器。

span.span: Represents a container that can store multiple data objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是抽象類別，可用來將物件組織在單一實體的定義實體，可攜性和高效率的存取。 is an abstract class that can be used to organize objects into a single entity of a defined physical format for portability and efficient access. ZIP 檔案是主要實體格式。A ZIP file is the primary physical format for the . 其他實作可能使用其他實體的格式，例如 XML 文件時，資料庫，或 Web 服務。Other implementations might use other physical formats such as an XML document, a database, or Web service. 項目包含在檔案系統，例如在階層式組織中的資料夾與檔案參考。Like a file system, items contained in a are referenced in a hierarchical organization of folders and files. 雖然本身是抽象類別，衍生的類別做為預設的 方法。Although itself is an abstract class, the derived class is used as default by the method. A （「 組件 」） 是抽象類別，代表儲存在物件。A ("part") is the abstract class that represents an object that is stored in a . A （「 關聯性 」） 會定義來源之間的關聯或和目標物件。A ("relationship") defines an association between a source or and a target object. A可以是下列其中一種，每一個都可以有兩種形式：A can be one of two types, each of which can be one of two forms: - 封裝層關係 (由方法) 與相關為：A package-level relationship (created by the method) relates a to either: - 目標組件在封裝中。A target part in the package. - 目標封裝外部的資源。A target resource outside the package. - 組件層關係 (由方法) 與來源為：A part-level relationship (created by the method) relates a source to either: - 在封裝中的另一個目標組件。Another target part in the package. - 目標封裝外部的資源。A target resource outside the package. 關聯性的來源或來源會被視為 「 擁有者 」 的關聯性。The relationship's source or source is considered the "owner" of the relationship. 刪除來源物件時，會一併刪除來源物件所擁有的所有關聯性。When the source object is deleted, all the relationships owned by the source object are also deleted. 建立或刪除關聯性的程序不會實際變更以任何方式的來源或目標物件。The process of creating or deleting a relationship does not physically change either the source or target objects in any way. A （「 數位簽章 」） 是組件和關係代表隨附的數位簽章的組合。A ("digital signature") is a composition of parts and relationships representing a digital signature included with a . 數位簽章識別建立者，並驗證已簽署組件和關聯性包含在尚未經過修改。The digital signature identifies the originator and validates that the signed parts and relationships contained in the have not been modified. 封裝也支援數位版權管理 (DRM) 可讓內容中的項目加密與特定存取權限授與授權的使用者。Packages also support Digital Rights Management (DRM) which allows content elements in a to be encrypted with specific access rights granted to authorized users. 根據架構中，是設計用來儲存文件開啟為基礎的封裝類型[XML Paper Specification (XPS)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。Based on the architecture, an is a package type designed for storing documents based on the open [XML Paper Specification (XPS)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761). .NET Framework 會使用套件來儲存內容、 資源和網頁和依預設使用標準的 ZIP 檔案的文件的關聯性。The .NET Framework uses packages to store content, resources, and relationships for pages and documents using a standard ZIP file by default. 可以使用任何 ZIP 檔案中，您的應用程式類別來儲存並選擇性地保護任何類型或單一的有效存取容器中的資料檔案數目。As with any ZIP file, your application can use the classes to store and optionally protect any type or number of data files in a single efficient-to-access container. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱開放封裝慣例 (OPC) 規格可以從下載。For more information, see the Open Packaging Conventions (OPC) specification available for download at . ## Examples 下列範例示範建立的基本步驟。The following example shows the basic steps for creating a . 在此範例中，封裝會建立包含文件以及圖形影像是顯示為文件的一部分。In this example, a package is created to contain a document together with a graphic image that is displayed as part of the document. (這是類似於案例中具有 HTML 檔\ 標記，參考外部影像檔。)兩個元素也包含在封裝中。(This is similar to the case in which an HTML file has an \ tag that references an external image file.) Two elements are also included in the package. 第一天，「 封裝層級 」 關聯性會定義文件組件為套件的根項目。The first, a "package-level" relationship, defines the document part as the package's root element. 第二，「 組件層級 」 的關聯性定義文件組件 （「 來源 」 的組件層關係） 和其使用的映像組件 （""做為目標的組件層級關聯性） 之間的關聯。A second, "part-level" relationship defines the association between the document part (the "source" of the part-level relationship) and its use of the image part (the "target" of the part-level relationship). 如需完整的範例，請參閱[寫入封裝範例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160055)。For the complete sample, see [Writing a Package Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160055). remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生方法會呼叫衍生類別中實作的實體格式作為基礎來建立組件的方法。The derived method is called by the method to create a part based on the physical format implemented in the derived class. 根據預設，抽象的衍生類別實作類別會提供和使用。By default, a derived class implementation of the abstract class is provided and used. 在預設作業中，在內部呼叫的ZIP 檔案中建立新的組件的類別。In the default operation, internally calls of the class to create a new part in a ZIP file. 預設值衍生類別，方法只支援兩個`compressionOption`值或壓縮。For the default derived class, the method only supports two `compressionOption` values, or compression. 其他的值， ，或使用壓縮。Other values of , , or use compression. 如需有關封裝模型和封裝組件的詳細資訊，請參閱下載開放封裝慣例 (OPC) 規格的第 1 章。For more information about the package model and package parts, see Chapter 1 of the Open Packaging Conventions (OPC) specification available for download at .

summary.span: 建立特定組件的套件層級關係。

span.span: Creates a package-level relationship to a given part.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 封裝層關係定義封裝和相關聯的目標組件或資源之間的關聯。A package-level relationship defines an association between the package and an associated target part or resource. 封裝層關係可以有兩種形式。A package-level relationship can be one of two forms. - 之間目標套件內。Between a to a target inside the package. - 之間封裝外部的目標資源。Between a to a target resource outside the package. 封裝關聯性中，封裝會視為 「 擁有者 」 的關聯性。In a package-relationship the package is considered the "owner" of the relationship. 刪除套件時，會一併刪除的套件所擁有的所有關聯性。When the package is deleted, all the relationships owned by the package are also deleted. 建立或刪除關聯性的程序不會實際改變的目標組件或以任何方式的資源。The process of creating or deleting the relationship does not physically alter the target part or resource in any way. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱開放封裝慣例 (OPC) 規格可以從下載。For additional information, see the Open Packaging Conventions (OPC) specification available for download at . ## Examples 下列範例會說明如何建立之間和根文件組件。The following example illustrates creating a between a and a root document part. 如需完整的範例，請參閱[寫入封裝範例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160055)。For the complete sample, see [Writing a Package Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160055). remarks.format: ## Remarks 封裝層關係定義封裝和相關聯的目標組件或資源之間的關聯。A package-level relationship defines an association between the package and an associated target part or resource. 封裝層關係可以有兩種形式。A package-level relationship can be one of two forms. - 之間目標組件在封裝中。Between a to a target part in the package. - 之間封裝外部的目標資源。Between a to a target resource outside the package. 封裝關聯性中，封裝會視為 「 擁有者 」 的關聯性。In a package-relationship the package is considered the "owner" of the relationship. 刪除套件時，會一併刪除的套件所擁有的所有關聯性。When the package is deleted, all the relationships owned by the package are also deleted. summary.span: 傳回所有套件層級關係的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of all the package-level relationships.

returns.span: 包含在套件中的所有套件層級關係的集合。

span.span: A collection of all the package-level relationships that are contained in the package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 永遠不會傳回`null`; 不過，如果封裝不包含的任何封裝層級關聯性，傳回的集合可能包含零個項目。 will never return `null`; however the returned collection may contain zero elements if the package contains no package-level relationships. 封裝層關係定義封裝和相關聯的目標組件或資源之間的關聯。A package-level relationship defines an association between the package and an associated target part or resource. 封裝層關係可以有兩種形式。A package-level relationship can be one of two forms. - 之間目標組件在封裝中。Between a to a target part in the package. - 之間封裝外部的目標資源。Between a to a target resource outside the package. 封裝關聯性中，封裝會視為 「 擁有者 」 的關聯性。In a package-relationship the package is considered the "owner" of the relationship. 刪除套件時，會一併刪除的套件所擁有的所有關聯性。When the package is deleted, all the relationships owned by the package are also deleted. 建立或刪除關聯性的程序不會實際改變的目標組件或以任何方式的資源。The process of creating or deleting the relationship does not physically alter the target part or resource in any way. 如需有關封裝和封裝關聯性的詳細資訊，請參閱本文 1.3 開放封裝慣例 (OPC) 規格可供下載的。For additional information about packaging and package relationships, see section 1.3 of the Open Packaging Conventions (OPC) specification available for download at .
